name: TargaSaveOptions
shortdesc: Options for saving a document in TGA &#40;Targa) format.

property.name: resolution
property.shortdesc: The number of bits per pixel.

property.name: rleCompression
property.shortdesc: If true, RLE compression is used.

property.name: alphaChannels
property.shortdesc: If true, the alpha channels are saved.
